About Me :

A a highly motivated engineering graduate with a strong foundation in Python and JAVA, I am dedicated to pursuing a dynamic career that allows me to leverage my technical skills and passion for technology. My goal is to contribute to a forward-thinking organization, where I can continue to learn and grow, collaborate with a diverse team, and apply my problem-solving abilities and logical thinking to drive innovation and excellence in the field. With a background in web development and database management, I aspire to make a meaningful impact in the world of technology and programming.

My Projects :

    A simple on screen Calculator app using JavaScript Classes ,CSS and HTML. without using the eval function and has ability to use previous value.

  • Weather App

    Simple JavaScript project to demonstrate use of API calls and Asynchronous JavaScript. where entering a city gives its current weather conditions.

    Code Live-Preview

  • Rock Paper Scissors

    The classic Rock-Paper-Scissors implemented in js a GUI and a P Vs C mode whoever wins five time wins the match.

    Code Live-Preview

  • Etch-a-Sketch

    Basic DOM manipulation using js to create a sketch-board of variable size boxes as individual pixels. Has two modes of drawing.

    Code Live-Preview

  • Sign-up Form

    Simple Sign-up form which uses local js to do client-side form validation and accepts if the conditions are met using js.

    Code Live-Preview

  • Library App

    A Library management app designed using js html css. with functionalities to add a book with author name, book-title, no.pages, Read/Not , and to list all the books

    Code Live-Preview

  • Tic Tac Toe

    Game developed with main goals to have as little global code as possible using factory functions. also used webpack as the bundler.

    Code Live-Preview

  • Todo List

    A simple Todo-List app using webpack session storage with separate lists for individual projects and basic CRUD operations.
